channel.title: Neo Nazi Propoganda
channel.description:
I think its time we come to a close whether or not we allow Neo Nazi propoganda to be posted on this Site, We are a multicultural and non-racist site that welcomes all types of races and cultures regardless of color, and yet people are posting pro Nazi images in the name of Free Speech.
I don't take offense to it since it is just pictures but other people especially one of the people here (will not be named) has taken offense to it.
The bottom line is do we agree to tolerate a crazed cult bent on eradication of non-aryans? Free speech or not I think its time to take a choice to Tolerate this nonsense or spaek their language through Dictatorship, meaning your rights of Free Speech will be lost and all mods will ahve authority to lock and delete all offensive posts.
BTW I'm not here to offend the Nazis, I don't support your group and I don't think it belongs in an environment such a Moparisthebest.
Discuss.

item.description:
@maels wrote:

Ron:

Neo Nazis pff what a bunch of jerk offs. Their more intelligence response would probably be a brain fuck.

I second that motion

@VG_Kobra wrote:

pixels:

Neo Nazi <—

We don’t mind Neo Nazis, We just don’t want their material to circulate or influence or offend anyone on this forum.

item.title: Neo Nazi Propoganda
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Oh my fucking god! My post was moderated <3

Also, it doesn’t match Mopar’s criteria, so I don’t know why it got deleted.

Read full topic

item.title: Neo Nazi Propoganda
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This is how it is going to work:

  1. I dont care what the picture is, if it is an offtopic picture in a post with no text or spam text, its getting deleted. Period.
  2. If the picture contains images of people being hung, dead people, or pornography, it is getting removed because of the children that browse these forums.

Other than those two, plus common sense, you can post any pictures you want, just dont spam them.

Read full topic

item.title: Neo Nazi Propoganda
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

I admit we need more enforcement but recruiting more mods just for just 1 situation? Maybe if the situation gets out of hand. I think our current mods are more than capable of handling the situation as proven by their ramblings that their posts are being deleted.

Read full topic

item.title: Neo Nazi Propoganda
item.dc:creator: @Hyjall Hyjall
item.description:
@Hyjall wrote:

My thoughts exaclty

I think mopar does need to recruit some more mods though.

Read full topic

item.title: Neo Nazi Propoganda
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

No I’m saying that it doesn’t matter, I’m saying we should start to consciously take an effort to prevent this, so far they were able to post saying they have a right to, now we should take away their rights if they do not comply accordingly to the TOA.

Read full topic

item.title: Neo Nazi Propoganda
item.dc:creator: @Hyjall Hyjall
item.description:
@Hyjall wrote:

VG_Kobra:

Most people don’t read the TOA, as a result you see people posting it, The fact that they can’t doesn’t mean anything since they ALREADY are.

In your first post you say whether we should or shouldn’t accept Nazi or other extreme cult pictures/material to be posted. Here you say that they don’t read the rules and that it doesn’t matter because they already posted.

So basicly what you’re stating is already answered. No, we don’t, the mods can ban them easily for posting things like the above. Do they? No. Because the posters are going to spit out crap about corrupted adminstration. They kind of “manipulate” the masses into chosing there side and thus starting a flame war: “WDF!?!? UNBAN XERXES!”.

Freedom of speech is totally beside this discussion, when they registered they accepted the TOA, thus limiting themselves from posting abusive contecnt. Ignore this rule? Ban them.

And you can quote and flame all you want. Lawl at me, try to “dis” me and then having a sidekick post owned afterwards. I don’t care, I honestly don’t. Because what is there to flame about? I’m only showing you what you (should’ve) read in the TOA.

In the end, this post will be lost with all the others.

Read full topic

No one follows rules, you arleady know that.

@Hyjall wrote:

You agree, through your use of this forum, that you will not post any material which is false, defamatory, inaccurate, abusive, vulgar, hateful, harassing, obscene, profane, sexually oriented, threatening, invasive of a person's privacy, adult material, or otherwise in violation of any International or United States Federal law.

They already can’t.
